item.description:
A Classical guitarist will be performing for free in Hamden in the performance space at Best Video.

I will get there by 7:15 (or earlier), since I don't know how much seating they have there.

The bar at Best Video sells wine, beer, coffee, and snacks.

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (texting is fine too).

PARKING: Best Video has a small lot, and you should be able to find other free parking around there.
item.how_to_find_us: Call or text me. Also, I'm tall (6'3")
item.name: 7/18 Wed - Free Classical Guitar Performance
